Know your words, earn points!

In this game, you are given two letters. You need to find a word that starts with the first letter and ends with the last letter. For each letter in the word you earn 100 points and one second on the timer. You start with 60 seconds on the timer.

 If you want to, you can share your accomplishments by signing in to Google Play Games in the home page.
